website_summaries.verdict: Grow your arsenal of lawn power tools with a Greenworks edger as a companion to your trimmer or other tools.
pros: Works as an attachment with Greenworks cable string trimmers, just swap the handle
Adjustable depth to edge cutting goes to 2.5 inches deep
Wall-hanging hook makes it easy to hang tool out of the way
Other power tool attachments available in the lawn care category
cons: Compatibility issues, check the model you want to use it with to be sure it will work

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have much OOMF!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and fits perfectly but.... Im not a lawn beast but this did not work well in edging my lawn. Doesnt have enough power and could only go a few (maybe 6) inches before it got bogged down and stopped. Go 3-6 inches back up go 3-6 inches back up and repeat for about 30 minutes. Thankfully I have 3 batteries for my other greenworks products.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Nice attachment
customer_reviews.text: Reaches pretty high. Cuts very well! I only threw the chain once in a half a day's work. My fault for not tightening it up a little. On first use, I definitely recommend checking to see if the chain has loosened after about 15 cuts (just like it says in the owner's manual! Lol) It was a bit of a pain to get the chain back on, but no worse than any other chain saw.
customer_reviews.author: Bridger

customer_reviews.title: Not great- will not cut a new edge.
customer_reviews.text: This attachment is flimsy. I got the strongest Greenworks corded line trimmer pushing this thing and it is just not up to the task of cutting through much of any soil whatsoever. The line-trimmer itself is fantastic, but this thing is not. The attaching joint is unstable, the whole thing flexes and twists badly under load, it is just not good. This will work for the lightest of edging jobs and maintenance only. Do not try to cut a new edge with this thing or you will be left frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: specialguest

customer_reviews.title: not enough power
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time and went about an inch or two before it would turn itself off in time out mode... over and over again.... granted that it was the first edging in the yard this year. Perhaps it would do better if I had rented an edger and did a power edge the first time, then it should be free of obstacles... but a weed eater would do the same job if it is being used to trim away grass edges. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SocialDragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Battery Hogs
customer_reviews.text: This attachment works great but it really drains the batteries quick. I have two 80v 2amp batteries. I can typically get about 30 minutes on my mower and about 25 minutes using my string trimmer or my hedge cutters. When I use this attachment I can only go for 10 minutes max. I thought this was unusual but when I contacted the manufacturer, they said this was about right and to be expected. Luckily I don’t have a huge yard so I can get buy without buying more batteries. Be forewarned though. Had I known I was only going to get 10 minutes, I might not have bought this attachment.
customer_reviews.author: G. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Great Attachment for my Stihl unit
customer_reviews.text: So I have been contemplating about purchasing a trimmer attachment for my Stihl unit. I was looking at purchasing the actual Stihl trimmer but luckily I happen to run across this one. I used it for the first time this weekend and I must say I am more than pleased with this product. Be careful when adjusting it because it gets pretty hot by the attachment area. Overall I will give this one 2 thumbs 👍. Yeah and the price is much better than what I was initially going to spend on a Stihl attachment.
customer_reviews.author: baldy238

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with Kobalt 80v tools!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Lowes 80v Kobalt trimmer and ordered this because after studying a friends Greenworks tool I came to the conclusion they are the same. It works PERFECTLY and actually does a fantastic job cutting through limbs. I hooked it up with ease to my trimmers power unit after disconnecting the trimmer attachment and tried a branch. It cut through it like butter, i then went and trimmed more branches and before I knew it my back yard was covered with branches. It was well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Attach
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in Greenwork's no response to my problem with this edger. I documented the problem with pictures and description months ago and they never even responded. I am writing at this moment as I just used it and am again fighting to detach it and attach the trimmer and need to yell at someone. The problem is that the detent button that locks it in the tube is very difficult to depress because internally it interferes with another part in the tube. It appears to be a minor manufacturing detail but it is not correctable by the user. Otherwise this seems to be a quality tool but further purchases will be of a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Slug

customer_reviews.title: Essentially Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to getting this to edge around my driveway and sidewalk. I've had a normal edger before and had no problems, but this thing just gives up so easily. As soon as it hits anything it doesn't like, it comes to a dead stop. That can just be some harder ground or thicker grass. I tried for about 30 minutes to do one area around my driveway, got frustrated, and just grabber the original weed whacker attachment. Oh well. Some things you might as well get gas.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: This attachment cut my edging time in half!
customer_reviews.text: This attachment cut my edging time in half, if not more. Sliced right through my edges. I struggled a little bit with the height adjustment, and I did have to stop a few times to clear out the dirt, but man, what a great tool! I usually use a push behind edger, but happy to say that will be going up for sale soon. This thing rocks... and I truly appreciate the metal edge guide on the back, that makes it easy when the thing pulls you along! :)
customer_reviews.author: 1inTexas

customer_reviews.title: Edges almost like a gas powered version!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use with my 80v2A Greenworks trimmer. I works almost as well as my old gas edger does and is sufficient to get the job done. The gas one is able to power through the parts that I have neglected whereas this one took a bit longer. Having to take a bit longer is OK with me as it means no more messing with gas/oil mixtures and fighting to get the gas trimmer/edger started. This is a nice addition to our shed and will be used on a regular basis (whereas the gas one would get used when it wanted to work.) Well worth having to keep nice looking sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Fry

customer_reviews.title: Easily attached to my existing 40v string trimmer power section ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily attached to my existing 40v string trimmer power section and worked like a champ. I had relatively thick St Augustine grass overgrown on my sidewalk and curb and it did a great job chewing through it. It would get bogged down, but took it slow and got it all cleaned up. It’s a battery hog (1-4hr and 1-2hr battery drained to do my corner lot) but overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KmB

customer_reviews.title: Love my big pole saw
customer_reviews.text: Much brrr. So cut cut. I think the Greenworks trimmer attachment system is great. The 40v has enough power for the tress in my area, and definitely super easy to trim queen palms and the like. If I could change something, I'd want the saw head to directly attach to the motorhead, with as little as pole as possible so I could use it as mini chain saw, and then have two pole extension tubes. The top saw head and pole is good and all, but it puts the saw head far enough away to make it unwieldily for close work.
customer_reviews.author: John the Leprechaun

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I had a neighbors tree going through my fence in a big way and it trimmed it with no problem. I have a rental property on the other side of me that had small trees that were growing out of control on the other side of my property. I spoke with the owner of the property and he agreed to take the trees down. After months of waiting I completely removed them in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Powers through limbs
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by battery longevity. Saw easily cut through several 4in limbs. You get a bit of a workout due to the weight of the battery, but I need the exercise. Easy to switch out trimmer for pole saw attachment. I recommend. Probably comeback to update after a few more uses. So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: H. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Hedge trimmer- not for electric GreenWorks trimmers?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing in the description says that this is not meant for electric greenworks trimmers. I can’t even find any reviews mentioning this... But, it says right on it, not for electric use. I can make it work by adjusting a few things and altering the connection to my electric 40v greenworks string trimmer (that accepts attachments), but if it breaks I would be on my own. Again, this is not a plug and play for a greenworks 40v electric trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave-D

customer_reviews.title: Let it spool up to speed.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cheaper alternative to the independent pole pruner. Easy to use. A little heavy ended. Be careful. Cuts like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: If it we a blower, it would suck. Actually, just plain sucks..
customer_reviews.text: pain in the ass to use. It hooks up very easy to the trimmer, but the metal piece the acts as a guide between the cement and grass is tiny and the blade is not sharp. It's 1/8th thick and has no blade edge, so it tears, not cuts. I wound up getting a metal edge head for the regular head and used that sideways. Maker should be embarrassed at this product and put a dunce cap on the design engineer.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Triple9

customer_reviews.title: Great little cultivator
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have the right engine for it in the greenworks line. It works great for a smaller cultivator. I used to level out some of my backyard and it held up like a champ. The only gripe I would have is I'm 6'1 and it's a little low if I want to apply any force I have to be bent over.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Edward Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I used this edger on the 80V unit, and it cut right through my edging all around my yard. It only bound up once and I just backed it out and restarted it. Gives a great, clean edge and it's easy to use. Just be careful you don't hit any gravel...
customer_reviews.author: chatham7

customer_reviews.title: greenworks trimmer/blower 8ov combo for $399 isn’t compatible enough with this greenworks edger.
customer_reviews.text: we recently bought for $399 the greenworks 80v pro blower and weed eater combo. then we bought this edger and it doesn’t attach to the previous purchase...the previous purchase it permanently attached with an internal wire in the pole. so we can’t figure out how to attach the edger to the stringer. we thought greenworks made compatible items....apparently not. we were surprised.. we had purchased this
customer_reviews.author: Tyson M.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more power
customer_reviews.text: It connected to my Greenworks weed eater without any problems. The only issue I have with the attachment is that it struggles with thick grass that has taken over the edge. I ended up using the string to get the edge then followed up with the edger. I'm hoping that it will handle it better with an edge that has been maintained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This accessory DOES NOT work!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first one. Did not work. Amazon replaced it immediately for me. The second one did not work either. Amazon replaced it with it with a 3rd one. SAME ISSUE!!! Chain is locked. This is a design issue. Very bad design... Very bad QA... Very bad customer service... what customer service?? Nobody answers the phones. Their emails responds are irrelevant. Time to send it back with everything else I purchased from this company.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeAndreads

customer_reviews.title: so much easier
customer_reviews.text: This made edging so much easier. It does take a few minutes to swap out the weed eater attachment for the edger, but it's not difficult. The motor stops when it has to work too hard, like if it's hitting concrete or really thick grass. This was annoying when my grass was thick from not having been edged recently, but when I edged again 2 weeks later the machine was nearly perfect, I think it only stopped once. Edging with the weed eater was difficult, but now it's both faster and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Brad A. Cupit

customer_reviews.title: Good quality edger attachment to round-out the battery operated lawn tools
customer_reviews.text: This Edger attachment works as it should! It seems to be well constructed and works great with the 80V tool it attaches too. The power is adequate to do a good job of edging my lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Mehdi

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE!  Part doesn't fit! !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was timely and at the front door. Amazon is great as always. However, the "goody" ended there. Although the part, a Greenworks extension hedge trimmer, looks stout enough for what I need, and it slides on the trimmer arm... WHOA! It stops 3/4s short of the way onto the post that must pop up and fit into it's little hole to be able to hold the power trimmer blade on SAFELY! Hummm??? I called and was the 40eth caller in line. So far, I've tried every possible way to make it fit and it just doesn't without making structural adjustments like grinding-cutting-shortening-etc., which will certainly void any warranty, instantly. How many stars does that garner? Can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Full Tang

customer_reviews.title: Good edger, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Strong edger, performs well. Can get a lot of mud and such stuck in between the guard and blade, but probably as expected as I haven’t edged for real. Connects well to the 80V trimmer I have, and responds nicely to the variable trigger speed. Good all around attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Overall a winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super handy piece. For most soil types it works like a charm, however, for packed clay it is somewhat of a challenge since it is not heavy like a standard walk behind tiller. It is not too heavy and the size is relatively easy to handle (I’m average height and build). Overall very glad I purchased this. It has made my gardening a lot easier and more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: bob007

customer_reviews.title: Don't but. Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed this but review hasn't showed up. Ordered this item and when I tried to use it, the chain didn't turn. I could move it slightly by pulling chain but spindle in shaft didn't move. Contacted Greenworks through Amazon, and got a replies may take longer than normal with COVID. 12 days later, after no response except the initial automated one, I replied to automated email. No response yet except my initial review hasn't shown up.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Pelley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think this product is there yet Keep working on it
customer_reviews.text: Just not strong enough with battery to cut sufficiently and if you hold that out in front of you while trimming for sometime, your back will be murdered! Try toKeep your body as forward as possible and don’t stretch your arms out reaching. I promise it will save you some distress.
customer_reviews.author: Jmc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Greenworks products that I've purchased (Twin Force 20" mower, hard surface sweeper, pole saw, weed trimmer), this is the only one I've been disappointed with. It trips off if it encounters a branch much larger than a pencil. I'm not giving up on Greenworks, though! I love all of my other Greenworks "toys".
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: far better than using line
customer_reviews.text: this is light enough my wife has been using it to edge our lawn - works great, we are standardizing on Greenworks and just bought their hedge trimmer to go with our mower and blower.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore M.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like a knife.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Cuts well. Makes yard edge look good again. Guard is pretty flimsy, gets caught in blade and chewed up. Adjustment takes a few tries to get right, but WAY better to use for edging than a weed eater type unit.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this attachment is perfect. it is very durable and easily attaches. i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for light weight edger jobs
customer_reviews.text: I have 260 feet of curb around my property. And this little tool did it fine. I don't recommend using it to start off your first spring spruce up because it's a little undersized for that task, especially if you have as much curb as I do. But for every week edging it does great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L Nipp

customer_reviews.title: Trimming Is a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurbished unit at a discount—no regrets. Could hardly tell it wasn’t brand new. Does so much that I could not do without a ladder before. I have had other pole saws that were disappointing, frustrating, inconsistent or non-functional, so I was not sure what to expect. This device works great with my regular trimmer and reaches the impossible limbs without having to strain.
customer_reviews.author: mcuppet

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because of the weight of it. Was a bit heavy for me. I have a Kobalt 80v string trimmer and it worked great as part of the attachment component. Would have given 5 stars if the weight wasn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: SSBooks

customer_reviews.title: Great attachment
customer_reviews.text: Attaches to the 2100202 string trimmer and does an excellent job of edging. If you've invested in the G-Max series of tools, this is a great addition
customer_reviews.author: Derwood

customer_reviews.title: No teeth - no bite
customer_reviews.text: This would fit in a 40V Greenworks power head (attachment capable). However, there is no fish bone or teeth so the cut would not "bite" into the hedge. I would not recommend this unit as a hedge trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very weak for the purpose of Edging
customer_reviews.text: May be this is initially or just a bad lemon. I used it with a 40 V, 2ah battery. It could barely cut. It jammed regularly with Red sign on the battery coming up. Reset it, did it again. Same thing.....eventually after 2 tries, it depleted a full battery
customer_reviews.author: Akankhya Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Works Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: Had this several months and it has worked very well. We moved into a smaller home and have a small yard, so I switched over to 80V greenworks for all lawn equipment and this had been a great attachment for the trimmer. Easy to switch out and very good power. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MoTex

customer_reviews.title: Works with powerworks
customer_reviews.text: Did a good job at edging my yard. I bought this to use with my powerworks 60v weed Wacker. It works well with it, No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RefleKtion

customer_reviews.title: Saves your back for cutting near ground level
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach to my Greenworks string trimmer. Battery lasts long for larger jobs. Really saves my back to not have to bend over to cut low like handheld hedge trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Macala

customer_reviews.title: Good for light duty cutting
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. CAREFUL! Comes very sharp. The attachment collars when cinched down to keep the separate sections together and from flopping around can restrict power getting from your power head to the saw head while cutting. This may be partly due to my gutless powerhead. Definitely not professional grade but does light homeowner work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Works well in dry soil
customer_reviews.text: The motor deserves a completely separate review than the edger. The edger works very well with dry soil. It easily chews throw grass and small roots. Makes a nice linear line The only con is damp/wet soil collects and clogs up the edger.
customer_reviews.author: DHO

customer_reviews.title: Extremely misleading product.
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer states on Amazon AND their website that it works with ALL Greenworks trimmers but it does not. If you have a battery powered trimmer... You know the one Amazon has as a suggested bundle with this attachment, it will not work. The two are not compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Hubbard110812

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This attachment is better then the trimmer head lol!!! saves SO much time and surprisingly strong!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Fits my RYOBI
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for 3 days so far so good. I have 2 ROYBI power heads one battery powered the other gasoline. Greenworks HBA45 Horizontal Blower Attachment works on both. It appears to be constructed exactly like The Ryobi horizontal blower that gave me 15 years of service or more. Can't tell one from the other besides the color.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Vaello

customer_reviews.title: Wear long pants, this will pick-up and throw rocks back at you.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Works well. But: Wear long pants and maybe thick socks, this will pick-up and throw rocks back at you. I've got a nice red spot on my ankle, four days later.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Returned due to confusion with Sunjoe line of products
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product as I got it confused with a Sunjoe product. Gave 4 stars as this is normally a reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Best Edger I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: This one attachment makes the entire system worth it. Better than any stand alone edger I’ve used. The weed eater is strong enough for St Augustine. Love the easy attachment change outs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Uses up battery quickly. I have a 60 volt ...
customer_reviews.text: Uses up battery quickly. I have a 60 volt battery. If your yard is not large, this is not a problem. If you have a large yard, you might want to consider getting an additional battery.
customer_reviews.author: YardBird Mary

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks EDA75 7.5" Edger Attachment
customer_reviews.text: If you want an edger that gets stuck after every 6 or so inch this is your edger. I had the Greenworks trimmer on max and this kept happening. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: QuyDaddi

customer_reviews.title: Great edger!
customer_reviews.text: I love this attachment. It is just as powerful as a gas edger and does an excellent job on my lawn edge. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Leon

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my grass is just super thick, but when I tested this out, the blade would stop as soon as i tried to edge.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice small chain saw.
customer_reviews.text: Very aggressive cutting blade. This keep one at a safe distance from the blade. My unit came with the blade too tight to rotate. So I had to learn how to adjust the blade just to use it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: heisetax

customer_reviews.title: Wow the power
customer_reviews.text: This edger pulls itself along the path that you have chosen and it is powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Dr

customer_reviews.title: Works fine on my Ryobi
customer_reviews.text: This works fine on my Ryobi and cost less than a name brand attachment would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: great product..Works well and does the job..only draw back is that it would be better if it cut through heavier branches..sometimes snags..Over all a good product
customer_reviews.author: John Finney

customer_reviews.title: Edges ok, but flap guard is useless
customer_reviews.text: It gets the edging done but at a cost. I had used this for less than 15 minutes before it slung a rock and shattered the front passenger window on my car which was easily 40 feet away in the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: clemsonjordan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with all tillers
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with my battery powered Greenworks string trimmer. The seller should more clearly list the trimmers that fit with the tiller.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hudman

customer_reviews.title: It does not fit string power head. ONLY gas ?? it was offered paired with battery tools!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that after buying the tool, i have to go back and shop for a head piece that fits to be able to actually use this tool. I already have a string trimmer before I bought Greenworks. The only head pieces are sold with string trimmers. Sad. I can't even find the gas power head that is supposed to match ????
customer_reviews.author: EagleMind

customer_reviews.title: Not as much power as a gas edger, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: The edger works best with a freshly charged 40a battery.
customer_reviews.author: John Friday

customer_reviews.title: Another quality greenworks item
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once an it worked well. Should last many years
customer_reviews.author: scott t

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Fast shipping . Easy to communicate with seller. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Karmi B

customer_reviews.title: No parts available
customer_reviews.text: bought pole saw attachment but before i ever used it i damaged the 3' extension pole. Called Green Works and was told that the extension part is not available to purchase and that i would have to purchase the entire pole saw assembly again. Sad that parts are not available if you break something.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Easy edging
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to give my yard that crisp cut edge look. Connect/disconnects to the string trimmer. The right to for the job.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you really need one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do a good job of cutting a hole in the grass. I've had trouble knowing where the cutter actually does its cutting.
customer_reviews.author: heisetax

customer_reviews.title: works was advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy set up and how fast it cuts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great !!!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased -- it does a great job and cuts clean straight lines.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy hook up
customer_reviews.text: I love this eager it’s so easy to use. A perfect job every time.
customer_reviews.author: Highway

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know which  Model this works with
customer_reviews.text: Look like a great product when I got it home I thought it would fit my green works 40 V strange river but I was wrong and had to return product look great though
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Grear product'!!
customer_reviews.text: It works great Make sure it is compatible with your weed eater.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful.
customer_reviews.text: It is not powerful enough to power through the first edging of the year. Once you have established your edge it is ok, but you have to take it very slowly if there is any dirt in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael B.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with a bigger blade otherwise it’s a 5 star. I have a cheaper gas trimmer and this works great on it. Of course you have take it slow if it’s the first time you’ve edged in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use item is NOT for use with the 40V system
customer_reviews.text: I feel that I should have been told before purchase that it would not fit the 40V system. Not a happy customer, have to rethink about purchasing any more things without being able to see before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Needs more power
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use is good. It does not have even close to enough power to take out a medium sized weed along the sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: Bestone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to interchange
customer_reviews.text: My first time using this edger I only had 2/3 of battery left and I was still able to edge my entire yard which is about 350 feet of edging. Easy to interchange, it's not heavy and the it's easy to guide when edging.
customer_reviews.author: Kram

customer_reviews.title: Non compatible
customer_reviews.text: Says it fits all free works tools but does not
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: The attachment works well and tears through vegetation easily to turn over the soil. I used it to reseed my backyard and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Stolpe

customer_reviews.title: Best blower
customer_reviews.text: Best blower ever! Only makes sense to keep the leaves blowing on the ground and not flying up in your face.
customer_reviews.author: jesse parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory, very much worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: The cultivator attachment is so worth not having to manually 'til my garden box. Should have purchased this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: mdm

customer_reviews.title: Edger. Attachment
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Allows me to use string trimmer and edger on the same frame. Easy to switch.
customer_reviews.author: Bob currie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to attach and use.  Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as advertised and was better than I expected! What use to take hours only took minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, has a hard time getting through the thick stuff.
customer_reviews.text: The other review said it best. Take it slow the first time around as it will get caught up and stop. The Battery will get very hot and drain fast. But after the first time It works great and as expected. Switching between this and the weed wacker takes 30 seconds. Very good and easy tool.
customer_reviews.author: alfman3310

customer_reviews.title: Great edging attachment.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I have only edged once, so I will update if I have any issues with durability, but it feels more stout than my old Craftsman model. The safety cover is plastic, but it is quite rigid. It operates very smoothly, and the wheel/guide setup works well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Messina

customer_reviews.title: Great Edger
customer_reviews.text: Have almost every tool Greenworks makes. Love them all. This attached to my trimmer in no time. Did a great job. The first time it was a bit of back and forth, but the second time was a whiz. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wright

customer_reviews.title: Tall weeds & grass does a good job of making a ball.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job cutting through sod or the overgrown garden plot. My unit seems to work better when I operate it by pulling it back to me rather than the normal away from me.
customer_reviews.author: heisetax

customer_reviews.title: It Works, but needs patience
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but need to take your time and ease into it by cutting in layers.
customer_reviews.author: Hecurb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item looked fine, but needed to return because I did not have the proper attachment
customer_reviews.author: SamJam

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my 80 volt Kobalt string trimmer that accepts attachments. Works great! My edges had never been, well, edged. I wouldn’t use it with anything less powerful, a few times it struggled due to my trimmer but nothing serious.
customer_reviews.author: SMPNW

customer_reviews.title: Great edger for my Greenworks
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to switch between the edger and the weedwhacker attachment. Love that concept.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kania

product_meta.title: Greenworks EDA75 7.5" Edger Attachment, Black and Green
product_meta.description: Size:Edger AttachmentThe Greenworks universal string trimmer attachments include a wall hanging hook for convenient storage, saving space in your garage. These versatile tools are designed for your attachment capable string trimmer, providing multiple functions to get the most out of your machine. 2 year warranty
feature_bullets: Fits all Green works attachment capable string trimmers
Wall hanging hook included for convenient storage
